channel.title: ♛ Nexus [718 Source / Squeal / Money Pouch] [Release] [Ready2Host]♛
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i1193.photobucket.com/albums/aa358/sanezero44/cooltext776748523.png[/img][/center]
[size=14pt]NOTE: THE PICTURES IM USING IS MINE, I MADE AND UPLOADED THEM MYSELF, NS3 USES MINE. I MADE THEM WHEN I POSTED THIS ON THE ADV PAGE! BTW: IM 1123R123R ON RUNE-SERVER http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,563215.0.html[/size]
[size=12pt]I [u]GIVE[/u] PERMISSION TO RE-RELEASE THIS, BUT GIVE ME CREDITS AND USE MY DOWNLOAD LINK (ADFLY), ALSO WHO CAN MAKE A NEXUS LOGO FOR ME? ILL GIVE YOU THE SOURCE A COUPLE DAYS BEFORE I WILL RELEASE! PM ME![/size]
[left][size=14pt][u]TODO In v2:[/u][/size] ~Fix Squeal 100% ~Change shop prices for better ones. [Changed some prices, do the rest yourself] ~Fixing drop dupe. [Fixed 2 Major ones] ~Add g.e. (buy only, or sell too?) ~New home! ~New dialogues.. [Added] ~Slayer Master opening dialogue + dialogue working ~Server Messages
[b][u]Reply what i should add in the next release![/u][/b] [/left]
[left]
[size=18pt][u]Downloads:[/u][/size] Source: (replace , with a dot.)
http://adf,ly/D6s61 [size=18pt]New Download Link! Enjoy :p[/size]
Client: Use the matrix client..
Cache: Use the matrix cache
[/left]
[size=18pt][u]Information:[/u][/size] Full Godwars -Bandos -Kree'ara -Saradomin -Zamorak Dicing -Horse dicing -Seal dicing -Flower game All Caves -Forinth cave (revenants working with drops!) -Falador cave -More, cannot remember Duel Arena Agility -Wilderness agility -Gnome agility -Feldip Hills Tormented demons -Now fixed prayer! Barrows -Fixed chest loot! Dominion Tower -Working prizes! -Fixed Corporal Beast Fight Pits Fight Kiln -Currently being worked on, almost done! Fight Caves -Working all waves! Queen Black Dragon -Fully working, fixed some bugs! Trivia -Custom minigame Castle Wars -Fully working, c Clan Wars -Dangerous and safe working, even the purple portal now! Kalphite Queen -Fixed drop rate Jadinko's -Added cave and npc's + bonusses and drops! Glacors -Now dropping faster dragon boots, but a bit more attack bonus! All 22/24 Skills working -Dungeoneering is being worked on, it is going to be released very soon!
::pkshop ::donatorshop (only opens if player is donor) ::train Pvp token drop when a player gets killed.
[u][size=12pt]Mini-Guides![/size][/u]
Change EXP Rate in settings.java and player.java (look for public void addXP)
How to make yourself admin, go to commands.java and look for the admin command ( case "admin": ) then youll see a name under it, change it to your own name, save, compile, run, type the command and enjoy!
How to change Client ip, go to loader.java and change the 127.0.0.1 to your no-ip/vps ip!
Media Time!
(Allot)

item.title: ♛ Nexus [718 Source / Squeal / Money Pouch] [Release] [Ready2Host]♛
item.dc:creator: @wouthacks wouthacks
item.description:
@wouthacks wrote:

I need help with the compiler :mad:

This is my compile.bat:

@echo off title Nexus's Compiler echo [Nexus] Compiler has started... echo [Nexus] Please remain silence while compiling... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/*.java src/com/rs/cache/*.java src/com/rs/cache/loaders/*.java src/com/rs/cores/*.java src/com/rs/game/*.java src/com/rs/game/item/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/clanwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/creations/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/duel/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/pest/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/impl/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/corp/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dragons/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dungeonnering/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/fightcaves/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/fightkiln/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/fightpits/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/armadyl/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/bandos/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/saradomin/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zammorak/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zaros/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/kalph/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/nomad/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/others/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/pet/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/qbd/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/slayer/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/sorgar/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/mining/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/runecrafting/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/thieving/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/agility/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/construction/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/rooms/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/pet/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/castlewars/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/events/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/fightpits/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/pestcontrol/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/quests/*.java src/com/rs/game/tasks/*.java src/com/rs/io/*.java src/com/rs/net/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java src/com/rs/net/encoders/*.java src/com/rs/tools/*.java src/com/rs/utils/*.java src/com/rs/utils/huffman/*.java echo [Nexus] Compiler has end, no errors found! pause

I need a .sh compiler. That works on Linux…
How can i change from bat to sh? I need it :S

Read full topic

item.title: ♛ Nexus [718 Source / Squeal / Money Pouch] [Release] [Ready2Host]♛
item.dc:creator: @alltimenewb alltimenewb
item.description:
@alltimenewb wrote:

oOTriKzzz:

I cant change the ip? I cant find loader.java? and where can i get the client and cache? im new to this sorry :L

:facepalm: But to be helpful, Loader.java will be in your client, and its okay if you are new to this, we all were new at some point. But I suggest that you start with a lower revision if you are new to learn the basics.

Read full topic

hur911:

What is this supposed to be

^his pic didn’t show up so you can see it on his post, top of page 4

This client displays the attachment I have posted, after loading and getting to 100% fetching updates. Please could someone explain what I’m doing wrong. I’ve had this problem on matrix and NR Server sources as well.

Thanks in advance.

java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xms512m -Xmx512m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true
pause

And this error…

off echo [Nexus] Server is loading…

C:\Users\Admin\Desktop\Nexus 718 Source ~Enjoy>java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThro
w -Xms512m -Xmx512m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.
jar com.rs.Launcher false false true
[Launcher] Initing Cache…

at com.rs.cache.loaders.ItemsEquipIds.init(ItemsEquipIds.java:13)
at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:63)

C:\Users\ADMIN\Desktop\Nexus 718 Source ~Enjoy>pause
Press any key to continue…[/quote]
u need a cache, and this source causes a virus
